title: Will magician twisted fate and pax twisted fate be available at the store?
body: Hey riot i was wondering if you guys would be willing to put the magician tf skin and the pax tf skin on the store i ask because i have all of his skins except for those i would really like em cus hes my favorite champion out of everyone of them thank you again. {{champion:4}}

replies.body: Legacy skins, such as Magnificent Twisted Fate will come back occasionally.  At this time, we don't have plans make PAX Twisted Fate available, since it was never in the store, and was a skin handed out to PAX attendees.

This is admittedly a bit off topic, but because you mentioned Legacy skins, but do you know if Traditional Skins (Trundle, Karma, and Sejuani) are considered Legacy? As in, will they return to the store at an unspecified time, or are they strictly going to stay "Only for old Trundle/Karma/Sejuani players and only available for the week of their rework).

And I'm not sure if it's your department either (I'm *pretty* sure your focus is the newer skins), but you're the first 'skins team' rioter that comes to mind when it comes to skins.

I do work on skins! 

We don't currently have plans to bring back the Traditional skins.
Hey KateyKhaos, I wonder if you guys ever gonna re-release Riot, SKT T1, Fnatic, TPA, Snowdown skins? I'd love to get my hands on some of them.
They're legacy, so they're on the table for skins that can come back. :]

The magnificent TF will come back whenever riot opens the legacy vault again.

PAX TF is never coming back. Ever. No questions asked.
